itunes:title: Episode 611 - The Silent Majority
title: Episode 611 - The Silent Majority
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the turmoil regarding the ongoing riots sparked by the unfortunate and unruly death of George Floyd, actions that can be taken to identify and fix problems that are contributing to the current instability of social...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the turmoil regarding the ongoing riots sparked by the unfortunate and unruly death of George Floyd, actions that can be taken to identify and fix problems that are contributing to the current instability of social discourse, and hope this conversation breathes some understanding into this difficult situation we Americans have found ourselves in.
